key_questions_answered.user_types: Technical stakeholders working with story_io domain model: developers, technical leads, QA engineers, technical writers
key_questions_answered.user_goals: Understand class structure, class interactions, sequential flows, architecture patterns, and domain model design
key_questions_answered.primary_users: Developers implementing/extending story_io, technical leads reviewing architecture
key_questions_answered.first_action: Load story graph JSON and render to DrawIO, or understand domain model hierarchy and class relationships
key_questions_answered.problems_solving: Lack of architectural documentation, unclear class relationships and flows, missing technical story map for implementation planning
key_questions_answered.struggling_points: Understanding how classes interact in workflows (render, sync, merge), determining level of detail needed, knowing which classes to focus on
key_questions_answered.system_interactions: DrawIO XML files, JSON story graph files, CLI interface, MCP server, legacy synchronizer
key_questions_answered.integration_points: Story graph JSON ↔ Domain model (serialization), Domain model ↔ DrawIO XML (rendering/synchronization), CLI → Diagram → Renderer/Synchronizer, Component hierarchy → Factory methods → JSON structure
